title: Unianalytics: Dashboards
description: Settings for both unianalytics side panel visualization widgets.

dashboardCollection.title: Collect clicks relative to dashboard usage
dashboardCollection.description: Whether to enable the collection of interaction clicks with the dashboard extension to better understand what features are more or less used.

numberingH1.title: Enable h1 numbering
numberingH1.description: Whether to number first level headings.

syncCollapseState.title: Synchronize the collapse state of the headings
syncCollapseState.description: If set to true, when a header is collapsed in the ToC the corresponding section in the notebook is collapsed as well and vice versa.
